sgcool_label_text:This is a piece of pink silk fabric decorated with flower and lozenge patterns. A piece of paper with ‘??????? ??? ??? ‘ is perhaps a clue to its source. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of materials used in the making of kebayas and baju panjangs.
